name: Garrison Gauntlet
description: Garrison Gauntlet is an oldschool-style action-platformer where you play through over four stages of intense challenges! A little robot that is to serve as nothing more than as one of the many robotic minions owned by the evil tyrant, Garrison, it realizes that being in such a position is no rewarding task.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, 8, 10 Storage: 38 MB available space
